name: Rocket Rage (MoodyBear)
description:
Rocket Rage is an unforgiving 2D physics-based platformer. Pilot your way through a maze of dangers to escape into space. Show us your fastest completion times.

Controller/Gamepad strongly recommended!

Rocket Rage was made for Ludwig Jam 2021. The theme was Foddian Games, so we built this to capture the true rage-inducing spirit of Getting Over It.

Controls

XboxPS4/5KeyboardBoostASquareSpaceRotateLeft stickLeft stickA/DGet upYTriangleR

We strongly encourage use of a gamepad/controller. Keyboard controls are much more difficult due to the nature of the game.

Note: Unity's legacy input system sees Playstation's R2 the same as the Xbox Start button. Clicking R2 to will pull up the in-game menu. We'll update that after the game jam.
